General.Name: GigCapital7 Corp. Class A Ordinary Share
General.Description: GigCapital7 Corp. does not have significant operations. It focuses on effecting a merger, capital share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization or similar business combination with one or more businesses. The company intends to focus on companies in the technology, media, telecommunications, artificial intelligence and machine learning, cybersecurity, medical technology, medical equipment, and semiconductors and sustainable industries. The company was incorporated in 2024 and is based in Palo Alto, California.
General.Address: 1731 Embarcadero Road, Palo Alto, CA, United States, 94303
